# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="ab729-102">Klaviatuuri otseteed Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab729-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab729-103">Outlook.com saate kasutada samu kiirklahve kui e-posti teenus, millega töötate, nagu Gmail, Yahoo Mail või Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab729-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab729-104">Avage [hõlbustussätted](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab729-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="ab729-105">**Seaded**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab729-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="ab729-106">**Vaadake kõiki Outlooki sätteid** > **üldist** > **juurdepääsetavust**) ja valige, milliseid kiirklahve soovite kasutada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab729-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ab729-107">Kiirklahvide täieliku loendi nägemiseks vaadake [Outlook.com kiirklahve](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ab729-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
